trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
There are only two properties in this class.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
The legend name.
Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
Can also be used to add custom legend items.

The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
The order of legend items can also be changed.

> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.

This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
